pull.title: docs: fix testmempoolaccept CLI syntax
pull.body: `testmempoolaccept "hexstring"` will give a "JSON parse error". The correct syntax is `testmempoolaccept \[\"hexstring\"\]` (but seems escaping is not displayed in other areas so leaving backspaces out).

verification.payload:
tree 646c28a20df11e99470d8c59e9d76c2749b46888
parent 9133227298ad97bbb10c44ac038f614c0bd7f7c7
author 1Il1 <33648696+1Il1@users.noreply.github.com> 1544839951 +0900
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1544839951 +0900

fix testmempoolaccept CLI syntax

`testmempoolaccept "hexstring"` will give a "JSON parse error". The correct syntax is `testmempoolaccept \[\"hexstring\"\]` (but seems escaping is not displayed in other areas so leaving backspaces out).

events.message:
fix testmempoolaccept CLI syntax

`testmempoolaccept "hexstring"` will give a "JSON parse error". The correct syntax is `testmempoolaccept \[\"hexstring\"\]` (but seems escaping is not displayed in other areas so leaving backspaces out).
